section1.title: 1. Definitions
section1.section1_1: 1.1 "2009" refers to the event ticketing platform owned and operated by SUMMIT2009 SDN. BHD.
section1.section1_2: 1.2 "Event" refers to any event for which tickets are available for purchase through the "2009" platform.
section1.section1_3: 1.3 "User" refers to any person or entity using the "2009" platform to purchase tickets.
section1.section1_4: 1.4 "Organizer" refers to the entity organizing the Event.

section2.title: 2. Ticket Purchase
section2.section2_1: 2.1 Ticket Availability: Tickets for Events are subject to availability. "2009" does not guarantee the availability of tickets until a purchase is completed.
section2.section2_2: 2.2 Pricing: All ticket prices are set by the Event Organizer and are subject to change. "2009" is not responsible for any discrepancies in ticket pricing.
section2.section2_3: 2.3 Payment: Payment for tickets must be made using the payment methods provided on the "2009" platform. All payments are processed securely.
section2.section2_4: 2.4 Order Confirmation: Upon successful purchase, you will receive an order confirmation via email. This confirmation is your proof of purchase.

section3.title: 3. Refunds and Cancellations
section3.section3_1: 3.1 Refund Policy: Refunds are subject to the Organizer's refund policy. "2009" will facilitate refunds as per the Organizer's instructions but is not responsible for issuing refunds directly.
section3.section3_2: 3.2 Event Cancellations: In the event of a cancellation, the Organizer will be responsible for providing refunds or rescheduling options.

section4.title: 4. User Conduct
section4.section4_1: 4.1 Prohibited Activities: Users agree not to engage in any activities that violate applicable laws, infringe on the rights of others, or disrupt the operations of the "2009" platform.
section4.section4_2: 4.2 Account Security: Users are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of their account information and for all activities that occur under their account.

section5.title: 5. Limitation of Liability
section5.section5_1: 5.1 No Warranty: "2009" provides the platform on an "as is" and "as available" basis. "2009" makes no warranties, express or implied, regarding the functionality or availability of the platform.
section5.section5_2: 5.2 Limitation of Liability: In no event shall "2009" be liable for any indirect, incidental, special, consequential, or punitive damages arising out of or related to the use of the platform or the purchase of tickets.

section6.title: 6. Intellectual Property
section6.section6_1: 6.1 Ownership: All content, trademarks, and data on the "2009" platform are the property of "2009" or its licensors. Users are prohibited from using any such material without prior written consent.

section7.title: 7. Privacy
section7.section7_1: 7.1 Data Collection: "2009" collects and processes personal data in accordance with its Privacy Policy. By using the platform, you consent to such processing.
section7.section7_2: 7.2 Data Sharing: "2009" may share user data with Organizers for the purpose of facilitating ticket purchases and event management.

section8.title: 8. Changes to Terms
section8.section8_1: 8.1 Modifications: "2009" reserves the right to modify these Terms and Conditions at any time. Users will be notified of any significant changes, and continued use of the platform constitutes acceptance of the new terms.

section9.title: 9. Governing Law
section9.section9_1: 9.1 Jurisdiction: These Terms and Conditions shall be governed by and construed in accordance with the laws of Malaysia. Any disputes arising under these terms shall be subject to the exclusive jurisdiction of the courts of Malaysia.

section10.title: 10. Contact Information
section10.section10_1: 10.1 Support: For any questions or concerns regarding these Terms and Conditions or the "2009" platform, please contact us at

section1.title: 1. Scope
section1.section1: This refund policy applies to all tickets purchased through the "2009" event ticketing platform. All refund requests must adhere to the terms of this policy.

section2.title: 2. Refund Conditions
section2.section2_1: 2.1 Event Cancellation: If the event is canceled by the Organizer, you are entitled to a full refund. Please note that refunds will be processed according to the Organizer's instructions, and "2009" is not directly responsible for issuing refunds.
section2.section2_2: 2.2 Event Postponement or Rescheduling: If the event is postponed or rescheduled, you may choose to retain your ticket for the rescheduled event or request a refund within a specified period. The specific period will be determined by the Organizer.
section2.section2_3: 2.3 Personal Reasons: Refund requests due to personal reasons (such as change of plans or inability to attend) are subject to the Organizer's refund policy. The Organizer has the discretion to accept or deny such refund requests.

section3.title: 3. Refund Process
section3.section3_1: 3.1 Refund Requests: All refund requests must be submitted through the "2009" platform. Please provide your order number, purchase details, and reason for the refund.
section3.section3_2: 3.2 Processing Time: The time to process refund requests may vary, typically completed within 10-15 business days of receiving the request. The processing time depends on the specific circumstances.
section3.section3_3: 3.3 Refund Method: Refunds will be processed using the original payment method used for the purchase. Please note that processing times may vary depending on the payment provider.

section4.title: 4. Non-Refundable Fees
section4.section4_1: 4.1 Service Fees: Any service fees or handling charges paid at the time of ticket purchase.
section4.section4_2: 4.2 Shipping Fees: If tickets were delivered by courier or other shipping methods, shipping fees are non-refundable.

section5.title: 5. Special Circumstances
section5.section5_1: 5.1 Special Events: Certain special events may have different refund policies. Please read the specific refund terms on the event page carefully before purchasing.
section5.section5_2: 5.2 Multi-Day Events: For multi-day events (such as festivals), if one day of the event is canceled, the refund policy will be handled on a case-by-case basis as per the Organizer's instructions.

section6.title: 6. Contact Information
section6.section6_1: 6.1 If you have any questions about the refund policy or need assistance, please contact the "2009" customer service team through the following methods:

contact_us.address: A04-11, PUSAT PERDAGANGAN EKOFLORA, JALAN EKOFLORA 7/3, TAMAN EKOFLORA, JOHOR BAHRU, JOHOR.
